title: 1STPLAYER SP7 White Mid Tower RGB Gaming Case
description: 1STPLAYER SP7 White Mid Tower RGB Gaming Case has a front Panel with ARGB dancing bar with 305mm wide body chassis. The Gaming case supports a VGA card verticalplug, supports 12cm Fan 9PCs, supports 360 cooling and has double-sided tempered glass. This Mid Tower casing comes in various colors that include white black and pink. The Light Board of the PC can be controlled by sound and rhythm that make a melody dance. Which means just the sound wave can make the panel light bar jumping. The SP7 White Mid Tower Gaming Case has a reduced size but the capacity  of the casing is not compromised for any performance. It is included with VGA Card Slot 400mm that is compatible for ITX Motherboard and M-ATX Motherboard and ATX Motherboard. And, comes with HDD and SSD slot. Also, the cooler placements of the CPU casing is made to be perfect for the most heat dissipation with roof fan 120mmx3, support 360AIO water cooling, Rear fan 120mmx1, Front fan 120mmx2, supports 240AIO water cooling, also the Lower intake fan 120mmx3, supports 360AIO water cooling.

prop.title: Fan Size
features: ON THE LEFT OF THE FRONT SIDE: 2*12CM
